pkgmetadata.longdescription: Compute Scagnostics on Pairs of Numeric Variables in a Data Set // Computes a range of scatterplot diagnostics (scagnostics) on pairs of numerical variables in a data set. A range of scagnostics, including graph and association-based scagnostics described by Leland Wilkinson and Graham Wills (2008) doi:10.1198/106186008X320465 and association-based scagnostics described by Katrin Grimm (2016,ISBN:978-3-8439-3092-5) can be computed. Summary and plotting functions are provided.
